summary: Modern, professional, bilingual (English + Bengali) coaching centre website for Brilliant Coaching Centre in Puabagan, Bankura, West Bengal. Features hero section with logo and WhatsApp CTA, about us section, courses offered (LKG-Class XII), why choose us highlights, photo gallery with lightbox, admission enquiry form with WhatsApp integration, contact section, and floating language switcher. Design matches official branding (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accent) with smooth animations and mobile-first approach.
architectural_notes: Bilingual support system (English + Bengali) with instant language switching
WhatsApp integration for enquiry form submissions and floating button
Brand color scheme: gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents
Smooth animations and hover effects throughout
Click-to-zoom lightbox functionality for photo gallery
Ready for future upgrades: Google Sheet integration, admin dashboard, email alerts, full coaching ERP
